data.title: Brian Gore & THE Tender Fritters
data.meta_description:
Mellow Lagoon by Brian Gore & The Tender Fritters, released 05 May 2021

Honey take me by the hand
and we can dance
in the light of the moon
at the mellow lagoon

drinkin’ margaritas in the sand
drinkin’ margaritas with our friends
in a real good mood
at the mellow lagoon

stars are fallin fog’s comin’ quick
but our evenin’ ain’t licked
we’re feelin the groove
at the mellow lagoon

ego don’t know how to get down
so we let ours drown
now it’s a party mood
at the mellow lagoon

the world crumbles in its jealousy
but there’s no time for envy
there ain’t no gloom
at the mellow lagoon

it’s easy for us to get along
grab a hand and sing a song
beneath the cool blue moon
at the mellow lagoon

so honey take me by the hand
and we can dance
in the light of the moon
at the mellow lagoon
data.text:
Songwriter Brian Gore, with his rotating cast of players, the Tender Fritters, blend Country, Folk, Rock, and Jazz to create a dynamic accessible while original that carries his tales of the world’s back pages.

"A mix of John Prine and Bob Dylan." ... more
